Testimonials

Here's what people have to say about working with me.

Chuck Terrell
Senior Software Engineer at One Technologies

The is a humble, insightful and hard-working individual. He has a work ethic that has propelled him into learning several new AWS cloud technologies in a short period of time. While working with The, I have had the great pleasure of solving a number of problems with him and have enjoyed the blessing and benefit of getting to know him as a person. The has proven time and time again that he is willing to take on any challenge that he is faced with. He is a very good listener and is quick to receive good counsel with coding best practices. He is equally good at understanding a problem domain so that he can offer necessary and critical aid to other developers. Overall, Mr. The has been an incredible asset to OneTechnologies.

View all Testimonials
Lauren Saxton
Lead Software Engineer at One Technologies

I directly worked with The for over a year on a greenfield machine learning platform team. I can say sincerely that I have never worked with a more capable, flexible, and selfless developer. The is an extremely fast learner and skilled throughout the development stack. He was able to onboard into the world of machine learning rapidly and with ease. The soon became an integral part of a very diverse and fast moving team. He performed not only the duties of a typical fullstack developer with ease but also became a go to resource for data centric and operation centric work. He is extremely capable with AWS technologies. The is a fearless developer - no challenge was too much for him. He brought heart and dedication to the team everyday along with his unrivaled technical skills. I would not hesitate to work with The again, and will clearly state: he is a resource you will want on your team, bar none.

Yusuf Aktar
Software Engineer at Onica

The is a great dev and an even better teammate whose dedication to getting a project past the finish line is phenomenal. He has the ability to pick up new technologies and problem domains, and will go truly above and beyond to get the job done. More than anything, The's greatest asset is his excellence as a teammate - he has the passion to build quality into his work, the problem solving ability to spot issues as we encountered them, and crucially, the selfless quality of empowering his teammates and encouraging contributions from all. His combination of dev ability and people skills make him the type of dev every team would be glad to have.
